name: propertymastersuk
description: PropertyMasters UK - Complete Property Management Platform

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build && vercel --prod
scripts.deploy:backend: supabase db push && supabase functions deploy
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build && npm run deploy:backend && npm run deploy:frontend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:frontend && npm run setup:backend
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend

author: PropertyMasters UK Team
